game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Find the ancient city and retrieve an artifact.
game.description: Rumors have surfaced about a lost city deep in the forest, where an ancient artifact lies hidden. Your quest is to find the city and bring back the artifact for further study.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces, a magical amulet, and 10 experience points.
game.quest-giver: The village elder of Oakwood Village

task.objective: Gather information about the lost city from local villagers.
task.description: Speak to the villagers and gather any clues or tips that might aid you in your quest.

task.objective: Explore the forest and follow the map to the lost city.
task.description: Use the information gathered from the villagers to navigate through the forest and find the lost city.

task.objective: Retrieve the artifact from within the lost city.
task.description: Once you have reached the lost city, find the artifact and retrieve it.
